item.title: CaAIPP1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CaAIPP1 Gene Name: protein phosphatase 2C 37 Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: Functional analysis of the pepper protein phosphatase, CaAIPP1, and its interacting partner CaAIRF1: Modulation of ABA signalling and the drought stress response.

item.title: CsDFRa
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsDFRa Gene Name: dihydroflavonol 4-reductase Genome: Species: Camellia sinensis Functional Descriptions: Site-directed mutagenesis revealed that the two amino acid residues S117 and T123 of CsDFRa play a prominent role in controlling DFR reductase activity.

item.title: CsDFRc
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsDFRc Gene Name: dihydroflavonol 4-reductase Genome: Species: Camellia sinensis Functional Descriptions: Enzyme activity analyses revealed that the two recombinant proteins CsDFRa and CsDFRc exhibited DFR activity, converting dihydroflavonols into leucoanthocyanins in vitro, but CsDFRb1 and CsDFRb3 did not.

item.title: FAD2-1A
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma10g42470 Gene Symbol: FAD2-1A Gene Name: omega-6 fatty acid desaturase Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Mutant alleles of FAD2-1A and FAD2-1Bcombine to produce soybeans with the high oleic acid seed oil trait.

item.title: FAD2-1B
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma20g24530 Gene Symbol: FAD2-1B Gene Name: omega-6 fatty acid desaturase Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Mutant alleles of FAD2-1A and FAD2-1Bcombine to produce soybeans with the high oleic acid seed oil trait.

item.title: GhSWEET12
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gorai.005G195100 Gene Symbol: GhSWEET12 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: RNA-seq and protein−DNA binding assays revealed that GhMYB212 was closely linked to the pathways of sucrose and starch transportation and metabolism, directly controling the expression of a sucrose transporter gene GhSWEET12.

item.title: GhVIN1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhVIN1 Gene Name: vacuolar invertase1 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Silencing the vacuolar invertase gene GhVIN1 blocks cotton fiber initiation from the ovule epidermis, probably by suppressing a cohort of regulatory genes via sugar signaling.

item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.12g071300 Gene Symbol: GmSIZ1a Gene Name: SUMO E3 ligase 1 Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: SUMO E3 Ligases GmSIZ1a and GmSIZ1b regulate vegetative growth in soybean.

item.title: GmSIZ1b
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.U020100 Gene Symbol: GmSIZ1b Gene Name: SUMO E3 ligase 1 Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: SUMO E3 Ligases GmSIZ1a and GmSIZ1b regulate vegetative growth in soybean.

item.title: TaCYP707A1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: TaCYP707A1 Gene Name: ABA 8’-hydroxylase Genome: Species: Triticum aestivum Functional Descriptions: Ectopic expression of TaNCED2A and TaCYP707A1B in Arabidopsis resulted in altered seed ABA level and dormancy with no effect on leaf ABA content and transpirational water loss.

item.title: TaNAC100-2A
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: TraesCS2A02G338300 Gene Symbol: TaNAC100-2A Gene Name: NAC domain protein 100 Genome: Description: Overexpression of TaNAC100 in wheat significantly reduced the contents of HMW-GS and other SSPs as well as total seed protein.

item.title: VviINO
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: VIT_201s0127g00330 Gene Symbol: VviINO Gene Name: Vitis vinifera INNER NO OUTER Genome: Vitis vinifera genome 12X V2 Species: Vitis vinifera Functional Descriptions: We conclusively demonstrated that the grapevine orthologue VviINO retains similar protein targets and activity in the grape as in Arabidopsis, since it could fully restore the outer integument growth in Arabidopsis ino-1 mutant.
